entry.title: Introduction to Hypothesis Testing
entry.content:
Alhamdulillah!Arabic for "Praise be to God", Muslim common phrase.
  1. Abu Zakariya (2017). Jesus: Man, Messenger, Messiah. IERA Conveying the Call. ISBN: 978-1-910952-03-0.
  2. The Religion of Islam (2007). The Story of Jesus and Mary in the Holy Quran. Last Modified 2014 and 2017, Retrieved February 4, 2018.
  3. The Qur'an - Arabic Text with Corresponding English Translation (1997). Saheeh International, Abdulqasim Publishing House. ISBN: 9960-792-63-3, Riyadh.
  4. Bible Study (2018). Olive Tree Bible Software.
